activities: Haystack Information Discovery (HAYSTACKID) is an end-to-end forensics and electronic discovery company whose clients have global operations in which data may be received and/or collected from operations in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland as requested by HaystackID clients and/or courts in support of litigation. All data received and/or collected in support of Legal activity remains attorney/client privileged and confidential. HaystackID does not solicit or reuse any personal data.
contactoff1: Six Beacon Street, Suite 815, Boston, MA 02108
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data that is received or collected that holds attorney/client privilege
recoursemech: If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, HAYSTACKID will refer any and all unresolved privacy complaints to the BBB
